main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over the Pacific on May 22.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped with colors red, white, blue, and green., It hovered and maneuvered for 25 minutes before disappearing., The object was observed using 7x50 binoculars at an estimated altitude of 10,000 feet., A naval message reported a similar unidentified flying object larger than a first magnitude plane., The object was descending and then leveled off, observed for 2 minutes from a reliable source.
witness description: staff watch officer and naval personnel
